title: Pet friendly community in Pomona. 3 BD / 3 BA. Call for tour!
posting_body: ['Meridian at Phillips Ranch', 'Featured Floorplan: 3-bed / 3-bath / 1832 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $3750', 'Deposit: $1000', 'show contact info', 'Description: Welcome to an unparalleled luxury living experience at Meridian at Phillips Ranch.', 'Our pet friendly community offers "NEWLY BUILT" spacious three and four bedroom townhomes featuring state of the art fully furnished kitchens, full sized pantry, central air conditioning and heating, washer and dryer, his and her own master bathroom sinks, separate shower and spa bathtubs and two full sized car garages.', 'Relax in our resort-style pool and spa, hosting friends and family in our club house or at our outdoor BBQ dining areas.', 'We are conveniently located in the southwestern portion of the city limits of Pomona, in Los Angeles County, California next to the Pomona Freeway (SR 60), the Orange Freeway (SR 57), and the Chino Valley Freeway (SR 71).', 'Enjoy shopping, entertainment and restaurants just minutes away in downtown Pomona or The Shoppes at Chino Hills.', 'Catch the newest film at Harkins Theater, shop at Banana Republic, J. Crew, New Your & Co., and eat at The Yard House, Pacific Fish Grill or P.F.Changs.', 'Meridian at Phillips Ranch Townhomes is the perfect place to live!', 'This 3 bedroom includes small storage and den/optional 4th bedroom', 'Lease Terms: 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', 'Pet Policy:', "Acceptable pets include cats, dogs, fish (50 gallon tank size limit with management's prior written authorization).", 'Other animals are subject to management approval.', 'Max 2 Allowed', 'Rent $50.00', 'Deposit $400.00', 'Breed Restrictions Apply', 'Apartment Amenities:', '✓ Air Conditioner', '✓ Electronic Thermostat', '✓ Extra Storage', '✓ Gas Range', '✓ Hardwood Floors', '✓ Large Closets', '✓ Patio/Balcony', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ W/D Hookup', '✓ Washer/Dryer', 'Community Features:', '✓ Access Gate', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Community/Onsite Parking', '✓ Courtyard', '✓ Dog Park', '✓ Garage', '✓ Gated Community', '✓ Gym', '✓ Pool', '✓ Swimming Pool', '✓ BBQ/Picnic Area', '✓ High Speed Internet', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Pet Friendly', 'Call us:', 'show contact info', '1 Lyons St', 'Pomona, CA 91766', 'Mon: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Wed: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Fri: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'THE REMM GROUP (DRE LICENSE #01949006)', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'E7C3B07DA41D498']
